channel.title: ABC15 Arizona | Phoenix AZ | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/ABC15

item.title: #BREAKING: Overnight stay at Grand Canyon hotels and lodges
item.description: #BREAKING: Overnight stay at Grand Canyon hotels and lodges is closed starting tomorrow and strict water restrictions are being put in place due to waterline breaks.

item.title: A new series of awards will enable the Arizona Department of
item.description: A new series of awards will enable the Arizona Department of Transportation to scatter more electric vehicle charging stations throughout the state.

item.title: JUST IN: A jury has found an ex-politician guilty of murder
item.description: JUST IN: A jury has found an ex-politician guilty of murder in the 2022 killing of a Las Vegas investigative reporter.
